text:
@BorisJohnson @David_Cameron & @theresa_may killed 130k with austerity, that's 65k each,
Spaff-Waffle's only been in power since December,he's already on 40k just with Covid-19 imagine what his tally will be if he's still in office after the cuts they'll say we'll need to pay for this kick in?
